snippet: If this is how the Patriots' defense is going to play all season, the N.F.L. might as well save us all time and give Robert Kraft the Lombardi Trophy right now.
abstract: If this is how the Patriots' defense is going to play all season, the N.F.L. might as well save us all time and give Robert Kraft the Lombardi Trophy right now.

headline.main: Week 1 Film Review: In Praise of Patriots' Defense
